bukkitrunnablehelper.handlers

Class PlannableHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitRunnable
      • bukkitrunnablehelper.handlers.TimeOutableHandler
        • bukkitrunnablehelper.handlers.PlannableHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class PlannableHandler
extends TimeOutableHandler
    A PlannableHandler is a BukkitRunnable which schedules a Plannable to be timed out after the specified amount of ticks. Instantiating this class is enough to schedule a timeout of a Plannable. Instantiating this class can only be done by the method TimeOutableHandler.handleTimeOut(TimeOutable).

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class bukkitrunnablehelper.handlers.TimeOutableHandler

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run()
      Gets called by the Scheduler and runs the TimeOutable.timeout() method after Plannable.getTimeOutTicks() ticks.
